subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur made 21 saves and Dainius Zubrus scored his first goal of the preseason in the Devils’ 1-0 exhibition win over the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.
snippet: Martin Brodeur made 21 saves and Dainius Zubrus scored his first goal of the preseason in the Devils’ 1-0 exhibition win over the Philadelphia Flyers in Newark.
